languages.text: "Не будем играть словами, Вайс тогда чуть не уничтожил корабль. О чем он, кстати, неоднократно предупреждал. Леди Теодора не послушала его, и это было ошибкой... Почему мне кажется, что я знаю, что будет дальше?"

"Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"
languages.original_text: "Не будем играть словами, Вайс тогда чуть не уничтожил корабль. О чем он, кстати, неоднократно предупреждал. Леди Теодора не послушала его, и это было ошибкой... Почему мне кажется, что я знаю, что будет дальше?"

traits.locale_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

"Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

"Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

"Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

"Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

"Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

languages.text: «Por decirlo en pocas palabras, Weisz estuvo cerca de destruir la nave al completo en aquella ocasión. Y lo que es más, nos advirtió repetidamente de la posibilidad de tal resultado. Lady Theodora decidió ignorarle y asumimos las consecuencias. Oh, ¿por qué tengo la sensación de que sé lo que va a ocurrir?».
languages.original_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

traits.locale_text: «Por decirlo en pocas palabras, Weisz estuvo cerca de destruir la nave al completo en aquella ocasión. Y lo que es más, nos advirtió repetidamente de la posibilidad de tal resultado. Lady Theodora decidió ignorarle y asumimos las consecuencias. Oh, ¿por qué tengo la sensación de que sé lo que va a ocurrir?».

languages.text: 「あまり細かいことを言うつもりはありませんが、ワイズは当時、危うく船を破壊しかけました。ちなみに、彼はそうなる可能性を何度も警告していましたよ。シオドーラ様が彼を無視したために、あのようなことが起きたのです。はぁ、なぜだか次に何が起きるか分かる気がします…」
languages.original_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

traits.locale_text: 「あまり細かいことを言うつもりはありませんが、ワイズは当時、危うく船を破壊しかけました。ちなみに、彼はそうなる可能性を何度も警告していましたよ。シオドーラ様が彼を無視したために、あのようなことが起きたのです。はぁ、なぜだか次に何が起きるか分かる気がします…」

languages.text: “毫不夸张地说，威茨当时差点把这艘船毁了。顺便说一句，他早就警告过我们很多次，说可能会导致这样的结果。西奥多拉夫人没有理会他的警告，结果就发生了那样的事情。噢，我怎么总觉得我能猜到接下来会发生什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

traits.locale_text: “毫不夸张地说，威茨当时差点把这艘船毁了。顺便说一句，他早就警告过我们很多次，说可能会导致这样的结果。西奥多拉夫人没有理会他的警告，结果就发生了那样的事情。噢，我怎么总觉得我能猜到接下来会发生什么事情？”

languages.text: "Um es geradeheraus zu sagen: Weisz hätte damals fast das Schiff zerstört. Übrigens hatte er uns mehrfach gewarnt, dass das passieren könnte. Lady Theodora hat ihn ignoriert, und wir haben die Ergebnisse geerntet. Ach, warum nur habe ich das Gefühl, genau zu wissen, was als Nächstes geschieht?"
languages.original_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

traits.locale_text: "Um es geradeheraus zu sagen: Weisz hätte damals fast das Schiff zerstört. Übrigens hatte er uns mehrfach gewarnt, dass das passieren könnte. Lady Theodora hat ihn ignoriert, und wir haben die Ergebnisse geerntet. Ach, warum nur habe ich das Gefühl, genau zu wissen, was als Nächstes geschieht?"

languages.text: « Sans entrer dans les détails, je tiens à souligner que le maître de chœur a bien failli détruire le vaisseau, la dernière fois. Il avait pourtant pris soin de nous mettre en garde à maintes reprises, mais dame Théodora l'a ignoré, et nous avons récolté ce que nous avons semé. Pourquoi ai-je la désagréable impression de savoir d'avance ce qui nous pend au nez ? »
languages.original_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"

traits.locale_text: « Sans entrer dans les détails, je tiens à souligner que le maître de chœur a bien failli détruire le vaisseau, la dernière fois. Il avait pourtant pris soin de nous mettre en garde à maintes reprises, mais dame Théodora l'a ignoré, et nous avons récolté ce que nous avons semé. Pourquoi ai-je la désagréable impression de savoir d'avance ce qui nous pend au nez ? »

languages.text: "Hususun üzerinde gereğinden fazla durmak istemiyorum ama Weisz, gemiyi neredeyse yok edecekti. Bize bunun gerçekleşebileceğine dair şans eseri birçok uyarıda bulundu. Leydi Theodora onu yok saydı, biz de sonuçlarına katlandık. Neden bizi neyin beklediğini bildiğime dair bir hisse kapılıyorum acaba?"
languages.original_text: "Not to put too fine a point on it, Weisz nearly destroyed the ship back then. Incidentally, he had given us multiple warnings that it could happen. Lady Theodora ignored him, and we reaped the results. Oh, why do I get the feeling that I know what will happen next?"
